message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is of great value to you.  I'm asking for $115 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your budget constraints, $100 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $110.  This would still allow you to get a great deal on a product worth significantly more to you.  What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $105.
